title: I am 14 years old and I am in 9th. If I give a K-pop audition and get selected as a trainee, will they wait for me a year so that I can complete my 10th? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, if you a Korean, then the company will make you go School of Performing Arts(SOPA) where many k-pop idols goBut they are only allowed to go once in a week or once in a month.You can give exams, but you need to self-study as you are only going once a week.But if you are not a Korean, then they will make you go to a international school in Seoul.But I don’t think they will wait for you cause if they do, then their whole plan of your debut will be unsuccessful.You can take 1–2 week leaveBut I don’t think that they will waitThen your debut will be postponed because companies will make you practice as a trainee as per their planHope this helped!!!

As far as history goes, most companies have done that. Take Lisa, for instance. She passed the auditions when she was 13 and became a trainee at 14. But if you’re Korean and live in Korea, I’ not sure
